column1: Material Culture and Gàidhealtachd History MSc
column2: University of the Highlands and Islands
column5: This ground-breaking, internationally acclaimed masters programme offers you a unique opportunity to investigate Gaelic culture – entirely through the language of the Gaels themselves.The course gives you the chance to study in-depth the extraordinary transformations affecting the Gaelic world during recent centuries up to the present day, drawing upon the wealth of material culture, literature, tradition, and language of the people of the Highlands.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
